languages.text: "Право лицезреть чудо пресуществления плоти в священный металл доступно лишь взошедшим на ступень инициата. Однако твой высокий статус {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} позволяет мне сделать частичное исключение и продемонстрировать свои священные стигматы".

traits.locale_text: "Право лицезреть чудо пресуществления плоти в священный металл доступно лишь взошедшим на ступень инициата. Однако твой высокий статус {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} позволяет мне сделать частичное исключение и продемонстрировать свои священные стигматы".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."
languages.original_text: "Право лицезреть чудо пресуществления плоти в священный металл доступно лишь взошедшим на ступень инициата. Однако твой высокий статус {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} позволяет мне сделать частичное исключение и продемонстрировать свои священные стигматы".

However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “只有那些已经晋级到进阶者的成员，才有权见证肉体与神圣金属融合的奇迹。不过，鉴于你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，拥有崇高的地位，我可以暂且破例，向你展示我神圣的印记。”
languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: “只有那些已经晋级到进阶者的成员，才有权见证肉体与神圣金属融合的奇迹。不过，鉴于你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，拥有崇高的地位，我可以暂且破例，向你展示我神圣的印记。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El derecho a presenciar el milagro de la fusión de la carne con el metal sagrado está reservado a aquellos que alcanzan el rango de iniciado. Sin embargo, su elevado estatus como {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} me permite hacer una excepción parcial y revelar mis estigmas sagrados».
languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: «El derecho a presenciar el milagro de la fusión de la carne con el metal sagrado está reservado a aquellos que alcanzan el rango de iniciado. Sin embargo, su elevado estatus como {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} me permite hacer una excepción parcial y revelar mis estigmas sagrados».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「肉体が聖なる金属と融合する奇跡を目撃する権利は、伝授者に昇格した者だけに与えられている。しかし、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}という気高きな身分であれば、一部を例外とし聖痕を明かすことができるやもしれぬ」
languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: 「肉体が聖なる金属と融合する奇跡を目撃する権利は、伝授者に昇格した者だけに与えられている。しかし、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}という気高きな身分であれば、一部を例外とし聖痕を明かすことができるやもしれぬ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Nur, wer in den Rang eines Eingeweihten aufgestiegen ist, darf Zeuge des Wunders werden, wie Fleisch mit heiligen Metall verschmolzen wird. Doch Euer erhabener Status als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g} gestattet es mir, eine Ausnahme zu machen und meine heiligen Stigmata zu offenbaren."
languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: "Nur, wer in den Rang eines Eingeweihten aufgestiegen ist, darf Zeuge des Wunders werden, wie Fleisch mit heiligen Metall verschmolzen wird. Doch Euer erhabener Status als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g} gestattet es mir, eine Ausnahme zu machen und meine heiligen Stigmata zu offenbaren."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le droit de poser le regard sur le miracle de la chair fusionnée au métal sacré n'est accordé qu'à ceux ou celles qui ont terminé leur initiation. Cela dit, eu égard à votre noble qualité de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}, je peux me permettre une exception partielle et vous montrer mes stigmates sacrés. »
languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: « Le droit de poser le regard sur le miracle de la chair fusionnée au métal sacré n'est accordé qu'à ceux ou celles qui ont terminé leur initiation. Cela dit, eu égard à votre noble qualité de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}, je peux me permettre une exception partielle et vous montrer mes stigmates sacrés. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of Rogue Trader allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

languages.text: "Beden mucizesinin, kutsal metalle birleşimine şahit olma hakkı, yalnızca irfan sahibi rütbesine yükselenlere bahşedilir. Ancak sizin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} gibi yüce bir statüye sahip olmanız, bana kısmi bir istisna yapma ve kutsal stigmatamı gözler önüne serme olanağı tanıyor."
languages.original_text: "The right to witness the miracle of flesh being fused with holy metal is granted only to those who have ascended to the rank of initiate. However, your lofty status of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} allows me to make a partial exception and reveal my sacred stigmata."

traits.locale_text: "Beden mucizesinin, kutsal metalle birleşimine şahit olma hakkı yalnızca irfan sahibi rütbesine yükselenlere bahşedilir. Sizin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} gibi yüce bir statüye sahip olmanız bana kısmi bir istisna yapma ve kutsal stigmatamı gözler önüne serme olanağı tanıyor ama."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
